website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a tinted moisturizer, this one earns high marks for offering excellent moisture, versatile skin-enhancing tint, and superior sun protection in a formula that also feels nice on the skin.
pros: Formulated with a pigmentation that works for most skin tones
Feels lightweight on the skin and provides a dewy, natural glow
Delivers an impressive SPF 30, and can easily be worn alone or under makeup
cons: Tends to sell out quickly, but this is a testament to the loyal customer base it has earned

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this product from this retailer. It is not the actual product from Perricone MD. It smells awful and nothing like the genuine product.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica A. Romero

customer_reviews.title: May be an already used jar of cream...jar came without a box
customer_reviews.text: My product did not come in the box it generally comes in...the product looks perfect so I’m ok...I usually throw the box into the recycle anyhow...I just hope I got all the product and not a partially used jar as the level of cream is pretty low in the jar...
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Boor

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT BY FAR
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely ADORE this tinted moisturizer. The texture feels light and the coverage is far more superior than any other high end product on the market. My mom and I both have and love this product because it adjusts perfectly to most skin colors (She's a very light pale and I have more darker skin with lighter undertones)
customer_reviews.author: VIP Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Something is amiss. Looks like cement.
customer_reviews.text: Opened jar and the “lotion” looks like gritty cement. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: amazonwomanMcG

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the original moisturizer but not with the TINT SPF 30. I just received and tried it today and I can truly say with confidence that it is lightweight, absorbs into my skin rapidly without any residue. I am now going to use this instead of a heavy foundation as it covers nicely. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful face cream

customer_reviews.title: Increases the appearance of pores
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed this cream does not work for me; it causes my pores to be more visible, where other products do not. The cream smells nice, and goes on smoothly, although I do not see any color; it may be more noticeable to others. I am sorry the cream is not returnable; now and then I take a gamble and lose. I will not be using this cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and returned
customer_reviews.text: I expected the product to be tinted, however, no where in the description did it state any specific color or level of tint, etc. Product color was too dark and made me look like I had a tan. I also did not like the texture of the moisturizer. For the price they charge, I expected a more superior product. I do not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: perfect moisturizer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend

Stopped using this product because it was $75 at Ulta and I didn’t want to spend that on myself— when I saw the price on Amazon I ordered immediately! Will definitely purchase again!

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but it's not the same stuff at Ulta
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same stuff that they sell at Ulta. I'm giving it three stars because I love the tint and the texture is nice. I just have no idea who really manufactured this stuff. The cream at Ulta for the exact same product does not have tiny color particles, it mixes with your skin to create the tint, rather than put it on like makeup. I still like the cream and am using it.
customer_reviews.author: dieslgrl

customer_reviews.title: Irritated Eyes and Skin
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having such a bad reaction to this cream around my eyes. It would sting a bit on top of cheekbones when I applied it. Over a few days around my eyes were itchy, swollen and red. Stopped using it and it stopped. It’s such a bummer because I love how it makes skin feel lightly covered and luminescent but won’t go back to it. Not sure what ingredient is causing it. Beware.

product_meta.title: Perricone MD High Potency Classics: Face Finishing & Firming Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 2 oz
product_meta.description:
A lightweight, fast-absorbing, tinted moisturizer with SPF. Pearlescent, pigment-filled micro-capsules release upon application for a natural-looking glow. A favorite among loyal Perriconistas, this tinted moisturizer immediately restores optimal hydration, while alpha lipoic acid reduces the appearance of lines, wrinkles and enlarged pores over time.

BRAND STORY
Perricone MD is the leading anti-aging authority on the science of beautiful skin, offering solutions to address every skin concern.
